name: Introduction to Intercultural Communication
description: A basic introduction to the concepts of intercultural communication, including cross-cultural communication, communication contexts, and communication strategies.

name: Foundations of Intercultural Communication
description: This course focuses on the foundations of intercultural communication, including theories and research methods, language and identity, and intercultural relationships.

name: Advanced Intercultural Communication
description: This course dives deeper into more advanced topics in intercultural communication, including intercultural communication in a globalized world and cultural competence.
